actionUnits.condition: Force the enemy close to the player so that, per EnemyAi (script guid 16000b3396174ab49b4983590de64f34), Update() sets playerInSightRange && playerInAttackRange true. This triggers AttackPlayer() automatically on the attached MonoBehaviour component (example: MonoBehaviour_4 id 1673477538 with sightRange=8, attackRange=6, timeBetweenAttacks=0.5, forceforward=10, forceup=1.5, Attackpoint fileID 2913934810850566424). Expected behavior: agent stops (destination set to self, acceleration=0), enemy faces player, AudioManager.Play("Gun Fire") called, a projectile prefab (guid 647ac56353c74ad49ae408a2c10d8464, fileID 6845118643277486568) is instantiated at Attackpoint and propelled by AddForce forward and up. alreadyAttacked toggles true and ResetAttack() auto-invokes after timeBetweenAttacks. Note: The MonoBehaviour component settings in the scene file (fileID 1673477538 and peers) are the exact serialized configuration of the attached EnemyAi script.

EnemyAi (script guid 16000b3396174ab49b4983590de64f34) is attached multiple times to this GameObject with exact serialized settings per scene MonoBehaviour components (ids: 614338935, 1888436447, 1640000274, 1646766445, 1673477538). After moving Enemy near the player (Camera Offset, id 4940586919770313183, found in Awake via GameObject.Find), Update() should detect playerInSightRange && playerInAttackRange and invoke AttackPlayer() automatically. Expected: agent stops (SetDestination(self)), acceleration=0, LookAt(player), AudioManager.Play("Gun Fire"), instantiate projectile (guid 647ac56353c74ad49ae408a2c10d8464, fileID 6845118643277486568) at Attackpoint (fileID 2913934810850566424) and AddForce forward/up using forceforward/forceup per component (e.g., id 1673477538: forceforward=10, forceup=1.5, timeBetweenAttacks=0.5). alreadyAttacked toggles true and ResetAttack() auto-invokes after timeBetweenAttacks.

Chase scenario: With player (Camera Offset) present and enemy positioned so distance is within sightRange but > attackRange for at least one attached EnemyAi component (e.g., ids 614338935/1888436447: sightRange=8, attackRange=6; ids 1640000274/1646766445: sightRange=10, attackRange=7), Update() should route to ChasePlayer(). Expected: agent.SetDestination(player.position), transform.LookAt(player) with constrained rotation about Y.

Patrol scenario: Place enemy clearly outside all sightRange values (>= 12 units from Camera Offset) so Update() routes to Patroling(). Expected: if no walkPointSet, SearchWalkPoint() picks a point on whatIsGround (m_Bits 2048) within walkPointRange=10, then agent.SetDestination(walkPoint). On reaching within 1f, walkPointSet resets.

Interact with the projectile prefab instantiated by EnemyAi.AttackPlayer() on Enemy Type 5. The scene MonoBehaviour components (ids: 614338935, 1888436447, 1640000274, 1646766445, 1673477538; all mapped to script guid 16000b3396174ab49b4983590de64f34) reference this prefab in the 'projectile' field (fileID 6845118643277486568, guid 647ac56353c74ad49ae408a2c10d8464). After Enemy Type 5 enters playerInAttackRange && playerInSightRange, AttackPlayer() should Instantiate this prefab at Attackpoint (fileID 2913934810850566424) and propel it with AddForce using forceforward/forceup from each component. Expected: a Laser instance appears and moves forward/up from the enemy. This Trigger validates interaction with the instantiated projectile asset.

XRGrabInteractable (MonoBehaviour fileID 1135932914521357561, guid 0ad34abafad169848a38072baa96cdb2) m_Activated event is configured to call Gun.TriggerPulled(ActivateEventArgs) then Gun.Shoot() on MonoBehaviour fileID 8183513503680063775 (guid d01186f01818ef24ead588d87fd2fea5). Fire rate is 1.5 shots/sec so cooldown is ~0.667s.
Second shot to validate fire-rate gating. XRGrabInteractable m_Activated persistent calls remain the same; ensure Time.time > nextShootTime before this trigger.
XRGrabInteractable (fileID 1135932914521357561) m_Deactivated event is configured to call Gun.TriggerReleased(DeactivateEventArgs) on fileID 8183513503680063775.
Manually invoke reload to test state change and UI/audio. Gun.reloadTime = 2.5 seconds. Should set text to 'Reloading', play 'Reload', and after duration reset remainingAmmunition to ammunition.
XRGrabInteractable (fileID 1135932914521357561) m_SelectExited event is configured to call Gun.DroppedGun(SelectExitEventArgs) on fileID 8183513503680063775.

Trigger XRGrabInteractable m_Activated (MonoBehaviour fileID 1135932914521357561, guid 0ad34abafad169848a38072baa96cdb2). Scene persistent calls invoke Gun.TriggerPulled(ActivateEventArgs) and then Gun.Shoot() on MonoBehaviour fileID 8183513503680063775 (guid d01186f01818ef24ead588d87fd2fea5). Fire rate 1.5 shots/sec (~0.667s cooldown). This should also instantiate 'Laser' (prefab fileID 6845118643277486568) and set its Rigidbody velocity.

Second activation to validate fire-rate gating and multiple instantiations of 'Laser'. Relies on XRGrabInteractable m_Activated persistent calls as above; ensure Time.time > nextShootTime before this trigger.
Trigger XRGrabInteractable m_Deactivated (fileID 1135932914521357561) which is wired to call Gun.TriggerReleased(DeactivateEventArgs) on fileID 8183513503680063775.

Manually invoke reload to test state transition and UI/audio when gun is Ready. Gun.reloadTime = 2.5s; expect text 'Reloading', AudioManager.Play('Reload'), and after duration remainingAmmunition resets to ammunition.

Trigger XRGrabInteractable m_SelectExited (fileID 1135932914521357561) which is wired to call Gun.DroppedGun(SelectExitEventArgs) on fileID 8183513503680063775, resetting trigger state if dropped mid-use.

Interact with the instantiated projectile prefab 'Laser' after Gun.Shoot to validate projectile lifecycle/collision. Note: Code expects a Rigidbody on 'Laser' (rb = GetComponent<Rigidbody>(); rb.velocity = ...), but provided prefab metadata lists Has_Rigidbody: False. Please confirm if 'Laser' has a Rigidbody and/or Collider so we can target appropriate interactions or simulate collisions.

Manually toggle the pause menu using PauseMenu.PauseMenu.PauseMenuCheck() to simulate InputAction started. Script fileID=4460531382388078979, guid=28d50a2d56ade1341ae8d933ebdfbe0c. Expect first call to Show (Time.timeScale=0, rays enabled, LocomotionSystem and Teleport managers disabled), then after 2s second call to Hide (Time.timeScale=1, rays disabled, LocomotionSystem enabled, RightTeleport=true => TeleportManagzerRight enabled).

Toggle the pause menu via PauseMenu.PauseMenuCheck() to simulate InputAction started. MonoBehaviour (PauseMenu) script_fileID=4460531382388078979, guid=28d50a2d56ade1341ae8d933ebdfbe0c. Expect first call to Show (Time.timeScale=0, ray_Right and ray_Left enabled, LocomotionSystem and both Teleport managers disabled), then after 2s second call to Hide (Time.timeScale=1, rays disabled, LocomotionSystem enabled, RightTeleport=true -> TeleportManagzerRight enabled).

Interact with Enemy Type 1 (tag=Enemy, PrefabInstance guid=2c3278d9e90e58e4a9b2d03c2de9efe0) to allow its AI/collider to engage the XR Rig (tag=XRRig). Expected: Enemy scripts will damage the XR Rig by invoking XRTarget.Hit(damage) on script_fileID=1221334210 until health is reduced from initial 10. XRTarget.Update will continuously update health UI.

Interact with Enemy Type 2 (tag=Enemy, PrefabInstance guid=bd4f238c957c283488d4a745fff71f33) to continue damaging the XR Rig via enemy logic using CompareTag/tag-based targeting. Expect further health reduction on XRTarget (script_fileID=1221334210).

Interact with Enemy Type 3 (tag=Enemy, PrefabInstance guid=0269d75519f38b0438a6a701dfb1196e) to allow continued engagement with XR Rig. Expected: If cumulative damage drives XRTarget.health <= 0, XRTarget.Update (script_fileID=1221334210) will: find all GameObjects with tag 'Enemy' and set them inactive, enable ray_Right/ray_Left, disable LocomotionSystem and TeleportManagers, activate deathScreen, start Wait coroutine, and call SceneManager.LoadScene(0).

Interact with Enemy Type 4 (tag=Enemy, PrefabInstance guid=476bac3c87a199a4d9f407530b2ab42a) to continue pressure; if XRTarget.health already <= 0, enemies should be set inactive by XRTarget.Update and main menu load initiated.

Interact with Enemy Type 5 (tag=Enemy, PrefabInstance guid=ecf49e437bf4de845930a6533a3f3425) as final escalation to ensure XRTarget.health reaches 0 if not already. On reaching 0, verify XRTarget death flow as per script_fileID=1221334210 and that SceneManager.LoadScene(0) is invoked.
